a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na ma-a-te u₃ o {URU}HAL.ṢU ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ŠA₃-bi ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia lu DUG₃.GA ṭe₃-mi ša DUMU-{1}ia-GIN ina KA₂.DINGIR.RA{KI} šu-u₂ {1}EN-u₂-du-u-a {LU₂}A-KIN {LU₂}A-KIN ša {1}e-ṭi-ri {LU₂}ŠA₃.TAM ša ma-la 02-šu₂ ina pa-an LUGAL be-li₂-ia il-lik-an-ni u₂-ma-a it-tal-ka ma-a ina E₂.GAL šap-ra-ka x x x x x-ti a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia a-sa-par-šu₂ LUGAL be-li₂ ša pi-i-šu₂ liš-mi {1}{d}PA-u₂-šal-lim {LU₂}kal-da-a.a ša a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia aš₂-pur-an-ni ma-a ina pa-an {LU₂}GAR-nu ša {URU}nu-gul šu-u₂ u₂-ma-a an-nu-rig ina ŠU.2 {LU₂}A-KIN-e-a {LU₂}A-KIN-e-a a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia u₂-še-bi-la-aš₂-šu₂
